Reference

Data

Data in the package

cds

Cds rstan script.

DSM_pack_MOLMOL

Data list to create a DSM example

effort_example

Effort example data.

Europe

Europe land contour.

lbrt93_proj

Projection in Lambert 93.

NEA

Northern East Atlantic land contour.

NEA_isobath100

Northern East Atlantic isobath100.

NEA_isobath200

Northern East Atlantic isobath200.

NEA_simplified_FR

Northern East Atlantic land contour simplified centered on France

observation_example

Observation example data.

shape_example

Shape-file example.

Functions

Functions of the package

Data preparation

ajout_obs()

Adding observation on effort.

change_effort_varName()

Standardisation of effort data column names.

change_obs_varName()

Standardisation of observation data column names.

prepare_data_effort()

Preparation of effort data.

prepare_data_obs()

Preparation of observation data.

verif_effort_obs()

Compatibility verification between effort and observation data.

Cds analysis

plot_detection()

Distance sampling analysis.

stan_cds()

CDS Bayesian modelling from stan model.

get_mcmc_summary()

Summarize mcmc output of stan.

DSM

fit_all_dsm()

Fit all possible model with the covariates given.

pred_map_dsm()

Prediction map of fitted dsm model.

pred_splines()

Prediction diagnostic.

predict_all()

Predict density from dsm models estimated with fit_all_dsm.

prep_predata()

Creation of predata and data impuation of missing data.

prepare_soap()

Prepare soap for dsm modelling

Kriging

fit_variomodel()

Fitting a variogram model.

predict_kriging()

Get spatial density / Abundance prediction.

quick_map_krig()

Visualize kriging prediction.

variogram_intraTransect()

Build a variogram object
